subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski, the driver who made a name for himself by posting on Twitter during the Daytona 500, put his name on the Sprint Cup championship trophy Sunday with a 15th-place finish in the season-ending Ford 400.
snippet: Brad Keselowski, the driver who made a name for himself by posting on Twitter during the Daytona 500, put his name on the Sprint Cup championship trophy Sunday with a 15th-place finish in the season-ending Ford 400.
